about.introduction:
I graduated from a university specializing in information systems and subsequently worked at a publicly traded IT company. After that, I worked at a venture capital firm in a systems engineering and support (SES) role before joining teamLab. Currently, I work as a SaaS engineer for a basic software company, and I'm always motivated by the prospect of creating something interesting.
As for my hobbies, I enjoy playing musical instruments such as drums, attending live music performances, and going to the gym.
